data.title: Prince Laurent and Princess Claire of Belgium’s 20th Wedding Anniversary
data.meta_description: Royal response from Their Royal Highness Prince Laurent and Princess Claire of Belgium on the occasion of their 20th wedding anniversary. Prince Laurent married Claire Coombs on 12 April 2003 at the Cathedral of Saints Michael and Gudula in Brussels, Belgium. The couple have three children, one daughter and two sons; Princess Louise of Belgium…
data.text:
Royal response from Their Royal Highness Prince Laurent and Princess Claire of Belgium on the occasion of their 20th wedding anniversary.

Prince Laurent married Claire Coombs on 12 April 2003 at the Cathedral of Saints Michael and Gudula in Brussels, Belgium. The couple have three children, one daughter and two sons; Princess Louise of Belgium born 6 February 2004 and twins Prince Nicolas and Prince Aymeric born 13 December 2005.

The reply is in the form of a card thanking me for my wishes on their 20th wedding anniversary. also included is a picture of Their Royal Highnesses Prince Laurent and Princess Claire with their children Princess Louise, Prince Nicolas and Prince Aymeric of Belgium

Picture
